summary: Implements a public CV notes blog with TanStack Router (list + detail pages), React Query-powered loading from a static posts manifest + markdown files, a warm paper-texture theme applied via CSS, and a header with illustration plus client-side search/filter. Some requested generated icon assets are not evidenced/used, and a few additions appear beyond the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated icon set (notebook, tag, search) as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI uses lucide-react icons (e.g., Search, BookOpen, Calendar) and there is no evidence in the diff summary that the required generated icon set file (cv-notes-icons.dim_384x128.png) exists or is referenced/used anywhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any requirement or acceptance criteria for the blog UI/theme/markdown/static assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty backend canister actor (backend/main.mo) despite the blog using static assets and not requiring backend functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on a static-asset markdown blog UI and explicitly avoids external databases/auth; adding a backend actor is not requested.
